Customers like the color options, with one mentioning the cobalt blue color pops, and consider it good value for money, noting it feels like a more expensive garment. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dupe of a more expensive gown!
items.body: Bought this in both the navy and burgundy to compare, as I needed a guest dress to wear to a wedding; the burgundy ended up being the best color for me, but rest assured, both fit the same exact way. This dress is a dupe of a Betsy & Adam dress. It isn’t lined, but the B&A dress is only lined in the respect that their fabric has a backer (you can still see the inside seams though), so not much of a difference — and the price of this one is much less than the B&A. I was very pleased with the quality, and it looked good on. The fabric is thick enough that I did not need to wear a shaper, but you can if you want. I wore my regular bra with it just fine! Also, the length is great for petite women because the back touches the floor while the front is slightly raised/split to offer a glimpse of leg. For tall ladies, the back will be ankle length. Because of the split/raise in the front, both floor and ankle length works well for petite and tall women. I love that I did not need to get it hemmed; I’m 5’4” and wore 2.75 inch heels and it was perfect for me. While form fitting, it does not accentuate the stomach because of the twist and ruffle design on the front, which is wonderful. My only concern: the twist part starts high up on the bodice. I am long-waisted, and it would have looked better on me if that twist started a little lower under the bust and more mid-waist. Other than that, 5/5 stars. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable dress for wedding
items.body: Loved this dress! Great price, color and quality! Recommended size was medium and it fit perfect! Very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, Flattering but Green Color is More Blue Grren
items.body: I love this dress! You can dress it up or down, wear it to a casual or dressy event. Maybe not as dressy for a black-tie event because the material is more jersey like, heavier material with nice amount of strength. Sizing: Very flattering on a curvy figure. I am 5' 2" and weigh 159; the Large fit me perfect and I love that I dont have to hem the dress! Negative: Green is more of a Blue Green Color. I am going to try the Dark Green color. Read more
items.author: Shoelover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
items.body: I read some great things about the dress, but wasn’t sure how it would fit me. I’m 5’2 and 135 pounds. I ordered a medium, which was the recommended size, in black. This dress is perfection, especially for a black tie wedding. The material is great quality, the length hits right at my feet (I’ll be wearing heels), and I don’t even need a bra. It’s definitely true to size, but not skin tight like you might expect, which makes it more flattering. The material is on the thicker side and slightly stretchy for reference. 10/10! Read more
items.author: JG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress!
items.body: Beautiful! The perfect dress! Great material, not too heavy but not too thin either. I was able to wear a normal bra with it.....I steamed it upon receiving it just to get the wrinkles out from where it was folded for shipping and they came out beautifully. I wore it all night to a semi formal ball....standing up and sitting down multiple times with out it wrinkling once. Prior to ordering it I was worried about how the ruching and gathering on the side would look when I took it out of the package but it looked beautiful! And the ruching hides the belly area perfectly, no body shaper or anything needed to wear underneath to flatten the belly. 5'3", 120lbs, size small was perfect for me with a pair of heels (heel height 2.7"). However if my heels were any shorter the dress might have brushed the floor. I got the purple.....such a beautiful dark shade. I am sure I will order again in a different color for other occasions. Read more
items.author: Me

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits beautifully but burgundy color has a brown undertone
items.body: This is a pretty dress and fits nicely (very slimming) and true to size. I am 5'3 apx 135lbs and typically wear a medium in dresses. Ordered a M in this and it fit perfect. Unfortunately color was off - i ordered the burgundy and it has a brownish undertone to it vs a deep red/wine undertone. It's slight but enough to make me return it based on color only. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable dress EVER!
items.body: This dress was so flattering , comfortable and great quality ! I wore it for a fall wedding and I honestly feel like I could use it again and again for other events super versatile . It’s stretchy but keeps its shape and the material is not sheer , pretty thick but not hot ,which I love ! Color is so vibrant , very happy with this purchase ! I am a size 4 - 130 lbs 5’6 Read more
items.author: Natalie Cisneros

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this one!
items.body: I typically have to get an extra large due to my bust size (12) and often times the waist and hips are a little loose. I was able to wear a large in this dress. It has a little stretch to it, so it fit perfectly all over. I am a size 10/12. It is very comfortable. The length is great. I am 5’ 4” and wore a 2.5” heel. I got compliments on this dress. I added a pin at the waist just to add a little bling to it. Highly recommend. Great dress for the price. (Sorry my pictures aren’t clearer, hard to show the detail of a black dress in natural lighting.) Read more
items.author: MaNonna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Sleeveless Formal V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split Sleeveless Formal V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Winered, Purple, Lightblue, Peacock Blue, Burgundy-1, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
